text: Hi there! I'm so glad you reached out. I'm here to help you explore your passion for beauty. What makes you interested in an esthetics school? I'd love to hear what drives you!

We offer exciting courses in New Jersey, including Skin Care, Cosmetology, Manicure, and Barbering. The next available start date for these programs is September 8, 2025. All students pay a $100 registration fee for any program. We'd love to hear what sparks your interest in these beauty fields!
